class="tittle">NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for CHRYSLER SEBRING LIMITED 2002-2006 2.7L/167</h1> <div class="product-image-box"> <div id="content1" class="product-image-container"><img src="https://midnightautos.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/04/ngkp6c.png" alt="NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for CHRYSLER SEBRING LIMITED 2002-2006 2.7L/167" /></div> </div> <div class="specifics"> <div class="titel">Product Description</div> <p>Description</p> <ul> <b> <p>These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One</p> </b> </ul> <p>FEATURES</p> <ul> <b> <li>Engine V6, Engine Size 2.7L/167</li><li>Engine Family Mopar V6</li><li>Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.</li><li>Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy</li><li>Sold In 6 Pack</li> </b> </ul> </div> <div class="fitments"> <p>FITMENT</p> <ul><b> CHRYSLER SEBRING LIMITED 2002-2006 2.7L/167 </b></ul> </div> </div> <div class="discription"> <div class="tab"><input checked="" name="tabs" id="tab1" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab2" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab3" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab4" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab5" type="radio" /> <ul class="tab-titel"> <li><label for="tab1" id="lt1">Payment</label></li> <li><label for="tab2" id="lt2">Shipping </label></li> <li></li> </ul> <section id="content1"> <p>We accept the following:</p> <ul> <li><b>PayPal</b></li> <li><b>All Major Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express,Discover)</b></li> <li><b style="background-color: initial;"><br /></b></li> <li><b style="background-color: initial;"><img src="https://thed.zone/wp-content/uploads/2018/04/Diesel-Zone_Payments.png" alt="Payment Gateways" /></b></li> </ul> </section> <section id="content2"> <ul> <li><strong>Shipping and Handling Charges Are Free</strong> unless specified in the listing.</li> <li>Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.</li> <li><br /></li> <li> <font color="#CC0000">**We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.</font> </li> <li> <font color="#CC0000"><br /></font> </li> <li><strong>Shipment Carrier:</strong> Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.</li> <li>International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.</li> <li>If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.</li> <li><br /></li> <li> <font color="#CC0000">**We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**</font> </li> <li> <font color="#CC0000"><br /></font> </li> <li><strong>Delivery Time:</strong> Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.</li> </ul> </section><b></b> </div><b></b> </div><b></b> </div><b></b> </div> </div> </div> <img src="https://ebay-222319.appspot.com/UA-129119093-1/itm/323455192211?pixel"></div>

id="social"></div> </div> <div class="product"> <div class="warraper"><input name="tabs" id="leftmenu" type="checkbox" /> <div id="CentralArea" class="zin-central"> <div class="top"> <h1 class="tittle">NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for CHRYSLER SEBRING LX 2001-2003 2.7L/167</h1> <div class="product-image-box"> <div id="content1" class="product-image-container"><img src="https://midnightautos.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/04/ngkp6c.png" alt="NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for CHRYSLER SEBRING LX 2001-2003 2.7L/167" /></div> </div> <div class="specifics"> <div class="titel">Product Description</div> <p>Description</p> <ul> <b> <p>These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One</p> </b> </ul> <p>FEATURES</p> <ul> <b> <li>Engine V6, Engine Size 2.7L/167</li><li>Engine Family Mopar V6</li><li>Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.</li><li>Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy</li><li>Sold In 6 Pack</li> </b> </ul> </div> <div class="fitments"> <p>FITMENT</p> <ul><b> CHRYSLER SEBRING LX 2001-2003 2.7L/167 </b></ul> </div> </div> <div class="discription"> <div class="tab"><input checked="" name="tabs" id="tab1" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab2" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab3" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab4" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab5" type="radio" /> <ul class="tab-titel"> <li><label for="tab1" id="lt1">Payment</label></li> <li><label for="tab2" id="lt2">Shipping </label></li> <li></li> </ul> <section id="content1"> <p>We accept the following:</p> <ul> <li><b>PayPal</b></li> <li><b>All Major Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express,Discover)</b></li> <li><b style="background-color: initial;"><br /></b></li> <li><b style="background-color: initial;"><img src="https://thed.zone/wp-content/uploads/2018/04/Diesel-Zone_Payments.png" alt="Payment Gateways" /></b></li> </ul> </section> <section id="content2"> <ul> <li><strong>Shipping and Handling Charges Are Free</strong> unless specified in the listing.</li> <li>Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.</li> <li><br /></li> <li> <font color="#CC0000">**We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.</font> </li> <li> <font color="#CC0000"><br /></font> </li> <li><strong>Shipment Carrier:</strong> Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.</li> <li>International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.</li> <li>If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.</li> <li><br /></li> <li> <font color="#CC0000">**We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**</font> </li> <li> <font color="#CC0000"><br /></font> </li> <li><strong>Delivery Time:</strong> Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.</li> </ul> </section><b></b> </div><b></b> </div><b></b> </div><b></b> </div> </div> </div> <img src="https://ebay-222319.appspot.com/UA-129119093-1/itm/323455192211?pixel"></div>

src="https://midnightautos.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/04/ngkp4c.png" alt="NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (4 Pack) for CHRYSLER SEBRING LX 2001-2004 2.4L/148" /></div> </div> <div class="specifics"> <div class="titel">Product Description</div> <p>Description</p> <ul> <b> <p>These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One</p> </b> </ul> <p>FEATURES</p> <ul> <b> <li>Engine L4, Engine Size 2.4L/148</li><li>Engine Family Mopar 4-cylinder</li><li>Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.</li><li>Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy</li><li>Sold In 4 Pack</li> </b> </ul> </div> <div class="fitments"> <p>FITMENT</p> <ul><b> CHRYSLER SEBRING LX 2001-2004 2.4L/148 </b></ul> </div> </div> <div class="discription"> <div class="tab"><input checked="" name="tabs" id="tab1" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab2" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab3" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab4" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab5" type="radio" /> <ul class="tab-titel"> <li><label for="tab1" id="lt1">Payment</label></li> <li><label for="tab2" id="lt2">Shipping </label></li> <li></li> </ul> <section id="content1"> <p>We accept the following:</p> <ul> <li><b>PayPal</b></li> <li><b>All Major Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express,Discover)</b></li> <li><b style="background-color: initial;"><br /></b></li> <li><b style="background-color: initial;"><img src="https://thed.zone/wp-content/uploads/2018/04/Diesel-Zone_Payments.png" alt="Payment Gateways" /></b></li> </ul> </section> <section id="content2"> <ul> <li><strong>Shipping and Handling Charges Are Free</strong> unless specified in the listing.</li> <li>Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.</li> <li><br /></li> <li> <font color="#CC0000">**We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.</font> </li> <li> <font color="#CC0000"><br /></font> </li> <li><strong>Shipment Carrier:</strong> Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.</li> <li>International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.</li> <li>If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.</li> <li><br /></li> <li> <font color="#CC0000">**We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**</font> </li> <li> <font color="#CC0000"><br /></font> </li> <li><strong>Delivery Time:</strong> Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. id="social"></div> </div> <div class="product"> <div class="warraper"><input name="tabs" id="leftmenu" type="checkbox" /> <div id="CentralArea" class="zin-central"> <div class="top"> <h1 class="tittle">NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for CHRYSLER SEBRING LX 2009-2010 2.7L/167</h1> <div class="product-image-box"> <div id="content1" class="product-image-container"><img src="https://midnightautos.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/04/ngkp6c.png" alt="NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for CHRYSLER SEBRING LX 2009-2010 2.7L/167" /></div> </div> <div class="specifics"> <div class="titel">Product Description</div> <p>Description</p> <ul> <b> <p>These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One</p> </b> </ul> <p>FEATURES</p> <ul> <b> <li>Engine V6, Engine Size 2.7L/167</li><li>Engine Family Mopar V6</li><li>Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.</li><li>Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy</li><li>Sold In 6 Pack</li> </b> </ul> </div> <div class="fitments"> <p>FITMENT</p> <ul><b> CHRYSLER SEBRING LX 2009-2010 2.7L/167 </b></ul> </div> </div> <div class="discription"> <div class="tab"><input checked="" name="tabs" id="tab1" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab2" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab3" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab4" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab5" type="radio" /> <ul class="tab-titel"> <li><label for="tab1" id="lt1">Payment</label></li> <li><label for="tab2" id="lt2">Shipping </label></li> <li></li> </ul> <section id="content1"> <p>We accept the following:</p> <ul> <li><b>PayPal</b></li> <li><b>All Major Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express,Discover)</b></li> <li><b style="background-color: initial;"><br /></b></li> <li><b style="background-color: initial;"><img src="https://thed.zone/wp-content/uploads/2018/04/Diesel-Zone_Payments.png" alt="Payment Gateways" /></b></li> </ul> </section> <section id="content2"> <ul> <li><strong>Shipping and Handling Charges Are Free</strong> unless specified in the listing.</li> <li>Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.</li> <li><br /></li> <li> <font color="#CC0000">**We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.</font> </li> <li> <font color="#CC0000"><br /></font> </li> <li><strong>Shipment Carrier:</strong> Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.</li> <li>International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.</li> <li>If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.</li> <li><br /></li> <li> <font color="#CC0000">**We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**</font> </li> <li> <font color="#CC0000"><br /></font> </li> <li><strong>Delivery Time:</strong> Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.</li> </ul> </section><b></b> </div><b></b> </div><b></b> </div><b></b> </div> </div> </div> <img src="https://ebay-222319.appspot.com/UA-129119093-1/itm/323455192211?pixel"></div>

Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.</li><li>Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy</li><li>Sold In 6 Pack</li> </b> </ul> </div> <div class="fitments"> <p>FITMENT</p> <ul><b> CHRYSLER SEBRING LXI 2001-2003 2.7L/167 </b></ul> </div> </div> <div class="discription"> <div class="tab"><input checked="" name="tabs" id="tab1" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab2" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab3" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab4" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab5" type="radio" /> <ul class="tab-titel"> <li><label for="tab1" id="lt1">Payment</label></li> <li><label for="tab2" id="lt2">Shipping </label></li> <li></li> </ul> <section id="content1"> <p>We accept the following:</p> <ul> <li><b>PayPal</b></li> <li><b>All Major Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express,Discover)</b></li> <li><b style="background-color: initial;"><br /></b></li> <li><b style="background-color: initial;"><img src="https://thed.zone/wp-content/uploads/2018/04/Diesel-Zone_Payments.png" alt="Payment Gateways" /></b></li> </ul> </section> <section id="content2"> <ul> <li><strong>Shipping and Handling Charges Are Free</strong> unless specified in the listing.</li> <li>Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.</li> <li><br /></li> <li> <font color="#CC0000">**We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.</font> </li> <li> <font color="#CC0000"><br /></font> </li> <li><strong>Shipment Carrier:</strong> Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.</li> <li>International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. id="social"></div> </div> <div class="product"> <div class="warraper"><input name="tabs" id="leftmenu" type="checkbox" /> <div id="CentralArea" class="zin-central"> <div class="top"> <h1 class="tittle">NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for CHRYSLER SEBRING LXI LIMITED 2001-2001 2.7L/167</h1> <div class="product-image-box"> <div id="content1" class="product-image-container"><img src="https://midnightautos.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/04/ngkp6c.png" alt="NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for CHRYSLER SEBRING LXI LIMITED 2001-2001 2.7L/167" /></div> </div> <div class="specifics"> <div class="titel">Product Description</div> <p>Description</p> <ul> <b> <p>These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One</p> </b> </ul> <p>FEATURES</p> <ul> <b> <li>Engine V6, Engine Size 2.7L/167</li><li>Engine Family Mopar V6</li><li>Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.</li><li>Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy</li><li>Sold In 6 Pack</li> </b> </ul> </div> <div class="fitments"> <p>FITMENT</p> <ul><b> CHRYSLER SEBRING LXI LIMITED 2001-2001 2.7L/167 </b></ul> </div> </div> <div class="discription"> <div class="tab"><input checked="" name="tabs" id="tab1" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab2" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab3" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab4" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab5" type="radio" /> <ul class="tab-titel"> <li><label for="tab1" id="lt1">Payment</label></li> <li><label for="tab2" id="lt2">Shipping </label></li> <li></li> </ul> <section id="content1"> <p>We accept the following:</p> <ul> <li><b>PayPal</b></li> <li><b>All Major Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express,Discover)</b></li> <li><b style="background-color: initial;"><br /></b></li> <li><b style="background-color: initial;"><img src="https://thed.zone/wp-content/uploads/2018/04/Diesel-Zone_Payments.png" alt="Payment Gateways" /></b></li> </ul> </section> <section id="content2"> <ul> <li><strong>Shipping and Handling Charges Are Free</strong> unless specified in the listing.</li> <li>Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.</li> <li><br /></li> <li> <font color="#CC0000">**We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.</font> </li> <li> <font color="#CC0000"><br /></font> </li> <li><strong>Shipment Carrier:</strong> Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.</li> <li>International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.</li> <li>If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.</li> <li><br /></li> <li> <font color="#CC0000">**We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**</font> </li> <li> <font color="#CC0000"><br /></font> </li> <li><strong>Delivery Time:</strong> Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.</li> </ul> </section><b></b> </div><b></b> </div><b></b> </div><b></b> </div> </div> </div> <img src="https://ebay-222319.appspot.com/UA-129119093-1/itm/323455192211?pixel"></div>

id="social"></div> </div> <div class="product"> <div class="warraper"><input name="tabs" id="leftmenu" type="checkbox" /> <div id="CentralArea" class="zin-central"> <div class="top"> <h1 class="tittle">NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (4 Pack) for CHRYSLER SEBRING LX PLUS 2002-2002 2.4L/148</h1> <div class="product-image-box"> <div id="content1" class="product-image-container"><img src="https://midnightautos.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/04/ngkp4c.png" alt="NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (4 Pack) for CHRYSLER SEBRING LX PLUS 2002-2002 2.4L/148" /></div> </div> <div class="specifics"> <div class="titel">Product Description</div> <p>Description</p> <ul> <b> <p>These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One</p> </b> </ul> <p>FEATURES</p> <ul> <b> <li>Engine L4, Engine Size 2.4L/148</li><li>Engine Family Mopar 4-cylinder</li><li>Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.</li><li>Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy</li><li>Sold In 4 Pack</li> </b> </ul> </div> <div class="fitments"> <p>FITMENT</p> <ul><b> CHRYSLER SEBRING LX PLUS 2002-2002 2.4L/148 </b></ul> </div> </div> <div class="discription"> <div class="tab"><input checked="" name="tabs" id="tab1" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab2" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab3" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab4" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab5" type="radio" /> <ul class="tab-titel"> <li><label for="tab1" id="lt1">Payment</label></li> <li><label for="tab2" id="lt2">Shipping </label></li> <li></li> </ul> <section id="content1"> <p>We accept the following:</p> <ul> <li><b>PayPal</b></li> <li><b>All Major Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express,Discover)</b></li> <li><b style="background-color: initial;"><br /></b></li> <li><b style="background-color: initial;"><img src="https://thed.zone/wp-content/uploads/2018/04/Diesel-Zone_Payments.png" alt="Payment Gateways" /></b></li> </ul> </section> <section id="content2"> <ul> <li><strong>Shipping and Handling Charges Are Free</strong> unless specified in the listing.</li> <li>Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.</li> <li><br /></li> <li> <font color="#CC0000">**We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.</font> </li> <li> <font color="#CC0000"><br /></font> </li> <li><strong>Shipment Carrier:</strong> Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.</li> <li>International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.</li> <li>If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.</li> <li><br /></li> <li> <font color="#CC0000">**We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**</font> </li> <li> <font color="#CC0000"><br /></font> </li> <li><strong>Delivery Time:</strong> Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.</li> </ul> </section><b></b> </div><b></b> </div><b></b> </div><b></b> </div> </div> </div> <img src="https://ebay-222319.appspot.com/UA-129119093-1/itm/323455192211?pixel"></div>

class="tittle">NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for CHRYSLER SEBRING LX PLUS 2002-2002 2.7L/167</h1> <div class="product-image-box"> <div id="content1" class="product-image-container"><img src="https://midnightautos.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/04/ngkp6c.png" alt="NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for CHRYSLER SEBRING LX PLUS 2002-2002 2.7L/167" /></div> </div> <div class="specifics"> <div class="titel">Product Description</div> <p>Description</p> <ul> <b> <p>These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One</p> </b> </ul> <p>FEATURES</p> <ul> <b> <li>Engine V6, Engine Size 2.7L/167</li><li>Engine Family Mopar V6</li><li>Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.</li><li>Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy</li><li>Sold In 6 Pack</li> </b> </ul> </div> <div class="fitments"> <p>FITMENT</p> <ul><b> CHRYSLER SEBRING LX PLUS 2002-2002 2.7L/167 </b></ul> </div> </div> <div class="discription"> <div class="tab"><input checked="" name="tabs" id="tab1" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab2" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab3" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab4" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab5" type="radio" /> <ul class="tab-titel"> <li><label for="tab1" id="lt1">Payment</label></li> <li><label for="tab2" id="lt2">Shipping </label></li> <li></li> </ul> <section id="content1"> <p>We accept the following:</p> <ul> <li><b>PayPal</b></li> <li><b>All Major Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express,Discover)</b></li> <li><b style="background-color: initial;"><br /></b></li> <li><b style="background-color: initial;"><img src="https://thed.zone/wp-content/uploads/2018/04/Diesel-Zone_Payments.png" alt="Payment Gateways" /></b></li> </ul> </section> <section id="content2"> <ul> <li><strong>Shipping and Handling Charges Are Free</strong> unless specified in the listing.</li> <li>Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.</li> <li><br /></li> <li> <font color="#CC0000">**We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.</font> </li> <li> <font color="#CC0000"><br /></font> </li> <li><strong>Shipment Carrier:</strong> Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.</li> <li>International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.</li> <li>If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.</li> <li><br /></li> <li> <font color="#CC0000">**We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**</font> </li> <li> <font color="#CC0000"><br /></font> </li> <li><strong>Delivery Time:</strong> Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.</li> </ul> </section><b></b> </div><b></b> </div><b></b> </div><b></b> </div> </div> </div> <img src="https://ebay-222319.appspot.com/UA-129119093-1/itm/323455192211?pixel"></div>

class="tittle">NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for CHRYSLER SEBRING TOURING 2004-2010 2.7L/167</h1> <div class="product-image-box"> <div id="content1" class="product-image-container"><img src="https://midnightautos.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/04/ngkp6c.png" alt="NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for CHRYSLER SEBRING TOURING 2004-2010 2.7L/167" /></div> </div> <div class="specifics"> <div class="titel">Product Description</div> <p>Description</p> <ul> <b> <p>These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One</p> </b> </ul> <p>FEATURES</p> <ul> <b> <li>Engine V6, Engine Size 2.7L/167</li><li>Engine Family Mopar V6</li><li>Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.</li><li>Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy</li><li>Sold In 6 Pack</li> </b> </ul> </div> <div class="fitments"> <p>FITMENT</p> <ul><b> CHRYSLER SEBRING TOURING 2004-2010 2.7L/167 </b></ul> </div> </div> <div class="discription"> <div class="tab"><input checked="" name="tabs" id="tab1" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab2" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab3" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab4" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab5" type="radio" /> <ul class="tab-titel"> <li><label for="tab1" id="lt1">Payment</label></li> <li><label for="tab2" id="lt2">Shipping </label></li> <li></li> </ul> <section id="content1"> <p>We accept the following:</p> <ul> <li><b>PayPal</b></li> <li><b>All Major Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express,Discover)</b></li> <li><b style="background-color: initial;"><br /></b></li> <li><b style="background-color: initial;"><img src="https://thed.zone/wp-content/uploads/2018/04/Diesel-Zone_Payments.png" alt="Payment Gateways" /></b></li> </ul> </section> <section id="content2"> <ul> <li><strong>Shipping and Handling Charges Are Free</strong> unless specified in the listing.</li> <li>Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.</li> <li><br /></li> <li> <font color="#CC0000">**We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.</font> </li> <li> <font color="#CC0000"><br /></font> </li> <li><strong>Shipment Carrier:</strong> Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.</li> <li>International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.</li> <li>If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.</li> <li><br /></li> <li> <font color="#CC0000">**We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**</font> </li> <li> <font color="#CC0000"><br /></font> </li> <li><strong>Delivery Time:</strong> Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.</li> </ul> </section><b></b> </div><b></b> </div><b></b> </div><b></b> </div> </div> </div> <img src="https://ebay-222319.appspot.com/UA-129119093-1/itm/323455192211?pixel"></div>

class="product-image-container"><img src="https://midnightautos.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/04/ngkp6c.png" alt="NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for CHRYSLER SEBRING TSI 2005-2006 2.7L/167" /></div> </div> <div class="specifics"> <div class="titel">Product Description</div> <p>Description</p> <ul> <b> <p>These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One</p> </b> </ul> <p>FEATURES</p> <ul> <b> <li>Engine V6, Engine Size 2.7L/167</li><li>Engine Family Mopar V6</li><li>Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.</li><li>Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy</li><li>Sold In 6 Pack</li> </b> </ul> </div> <div class="fitments"> <p>FITMENT</p> <ul><b> CHRYSLER SEBRING TSI 2005-2006 2.7L/167 </b></ul> </div> </div> <div class="discription"> <div class="tab"><input checked="" name="tabs" id="tab1" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab2" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab3" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab4" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab5" type="radio" /> <ul class="tab-titel"> <li><label for="tab1" id="lt1">Payment</label></li> <li><label for="tab2" id="lt2">Shipping </label></li> <li></li> </ul> <section id="content1"> <p>We accept the following:</p> <ul> <li><b>PayPal</b></li> <li><b>All Major Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express,Discover)</b></li> <li><b style="background-color: initial;"><br /></b></li> <li><b style="background-color: initial;"><img src="https://thed.zone/wp-content/uploads/2018/04/Diesel-Zone_Payments.png" alt="Payment Gateways" /></b></li> </ul> </section> <section id="content2"> <ul> <li><strong>Shipping and Handling Charges Are Free</strong> unless specified in the listing.</li> <li>Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.</li> <li><br /></li> <li> <font color="#CC0000">**We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.</font> </li> <li> <font color="#CC0000"><br /></font> </li> <li><strong>Shipment Carrier:</strong> Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.</li> <li>International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.</li> <li>If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.</li> <li><br /></li> <li> <font color="#CC0000">**We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**</font> </li> <li> <font color="#CC0000"><br /></font> </li> <li><strong>Delivery Time:</strong> Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. id="social"></div> </div> <div class="product"> <div class="warraper"><input name="tabs" id="leftmenu" type="checkbox" /> <div id="CentralArea" class="zin-central"> <div class="top"> <h1 class="tittle">NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for CHRYSLER TOWN & COUNTRY BASE 2003-2007 3.3L/201</h1> <div class="product-image-box"> <div id="content1" class="product-image-container"><img src="https://midnightautos.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/04/ngkp6c.png" alt="NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for CHRYSLER TOWN & COUNTRY BASE 2003-2007 3.3L/201" /></div> </div> <div class="specifics"> <div class="titel">Product Description</div> <p>Description</p> <ul> <b> <p>These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One</p> </b> </ul> <p>FEATURES</p> <ul> <b> <li>Engine V6, Engine Size 3.3L/201</li><li>Engine Family Mopar V6</li><li>Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.</li><li>Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy</li><li>Sold In 6 Pack</li> </b> </ul> </div> <div class="fitments"> <p>FITMENT</p> <ul><b> CHRYSLER TOWN & COUNTRY BASE 2003-2007 3.3L/201 </b></ul> </div> </div> <div class="discription"> <div class="tab"><input checked="" name="tabs" id="tab1" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab2" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab3" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab4" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab5" type="radio" /> <ul class="tab-titel"> <li><label for="tab1" id="lt1">Payment</label></li> <li><label for="tab2" id="lt2">Shipping </label></li> <li></li> </ul> <section id="content1"> <p>We accept the following:</p> <ul> <li><b>PayPal</b></li> <li><b>All Major Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express,Discover)</b></li> <li><b style="background-color: initial;"><br /></b></li> <li><b style="background-color: initial;"><img src="https://thed.zone/wp-content/uploads/2018/04/Diesel-Zone_Payments.png" alt="Payment Gateways" /></b></li> </ul> </section> <section id="content2"> <ul> <li><strong>Shipping and Handling Charges Are Free</strong> unless specified in the listing.</li> <li>Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.</li> <li><br /></li> <li> <font color="#CC0000">**We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.</font> </li> <li> <font color="#CC0000"><br /></font> </li> <li><strong>Shipment Carrier:</strong> Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.</li> <li>International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.</li> <li>If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.</li> <li><br /></li> <li> <font color="#CC0000">**We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**</font> </li> <li> <font color="#CC0000"><br /></font> </li> <li><strong>Delivery Time:</strong> Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.</li> </ul> </section><b></b> </div><b></b> </div><b></b> </div><b></b> </div> </div> </div> <img src="https://ebay-222319.appspot.com/UA-129119093-1/itm/323455192211?pixel"></div>

Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.</li><li>Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy</li><li>Sold In 6 Pack</li> </b> </ul> </div> <div class="fitments"> <p>FITMENT</p> <ul><b> CHRYSLER TOWN & COUNTRY EL 2002-2003 3.3L/201 </b></ul> </div> </div> <div class="discription"> <div class="tab"><input checked="" name="tabs" id="tab1" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab2" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab3" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab4" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab5" type="radio" /> <ul class="tab-titel"> <li><label for="tab1" id="lt1">Payment</label></li> <li><label for="tab2" id="lt2">Shipping </label></li> <li></li> </ul> <section id="content1"> <p>We accept the following:</p> <ul> <li><b>PayPal</b></li> <li><b>All Major Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express,Discover)</b></li> <li><b style="background-color: initial;"><br /></b></li> <li><b style="background-color: initial;"><img src="https://thed.zone/wp-content/uploads/2018/04/Diesel-Zone_Payments.png" alt="Payment Gateways" /></b></li> </ul> </section> <section id="content2"> <ul> <li><strong>Shipping and Handling Charges Are Free</strong> unless specified in the listing.</li> <li>Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.</li> <li><br /></li> <li> <font color="#CC0000">**We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.</font> </li> <li> <font color="#CC0000"><br /></font> </li> <li><strong>Shipment Carrier:</strong> Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.</li> <li>International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. id="social"></div> </div> <div class="product"> <div class="warraper"><input name="tabs" id="leftmenu" type="checkbox" /> <div id="CentralArea" class="zin-central"> <div class="top"> <h1 class="tittle">NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for CHRYSLER TOWN & COUNTRY EL 2002-2003 3.8L/230</h1> <div class="product-image-box"> <div id="content1" class="product-image-container"><img src="https://midnightautos.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/04/ngkp6c.png" alt="NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for CHRYSLER TOWN & COUNTRY EL 2002-2003 3.8L/230" /></div> </div> <div class="specifics"> <div class="titel">Product Description</div> <p>Description</p> <ul> <b> <p>These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One</p> </b> </ul> <p>FEATURES</p> <ul> <b> <li>Engine V6, Engine Size 3.8L/230</li><li>Engine Family Mopar V6</li><li>Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.</li><li>Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy</li><li>Sold In 6 Pack</li> </b> </ul> </div> <div class="fitments"> <p>FITMENT</p> <ul><b> CHRYSLER TOWN & COUNTRY EL 2002-2003 3.8L/230 </b></ul> </div> </div> <div class="discription"> <div class="tab"><input checked="" name="tabs" id="tab1" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab2" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab3" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab4" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab5" type="radio" /> <ul class="tab-titel"> <li><label for="tab1" id="lt1">Payment</label></li> <li><label for="tab2" id="lt2">Shipping </label></li> <li></li> </ul> <section id="content1"> <p>We accept the following:</p> <ul> <li><b>PayPal</b></li> <li><b>All Major Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express,Discover)</b></li> <li><b style="background-color: initial;"><br /></b></li> <li><b style="background-color: initial;"><img src="https://thed.zone/wp-content/uploads/2018/04/Diesel-Zone_Payments.png" alt="Payment Gateways" /></b></li> </ul> </section> <section id="content2"> <ul> <li><strong>Shipping and Handling Charges Are Free</strong> unless specified in the listing.</li> <li>Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.</li> <li><br /></li> <li> <font color="#CC0000">**We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.</font> </li> <li> <font color="#CC0000"><br /></font> </li> <li><strong>Shipment Carrier:</strong> Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.</li> <li>International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.</li> <li>If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.</li> <li><br /></li> <li> <font color="#CC0000">**We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**</font> </li> <li> <font color="#CC0000"><br /></font> </li> <li><strong>Delivery Time:</strong> Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.</li> </ul> </section><b></b> </div><b></b> </div><b></b> </div><b></b> </div> </div> </div> <img src="https://ebay-222319.appspot.com/UA-129119093-1/itm/323455192211?pixel"></div>

target="_blank"><img src="https://thed.zone/wp-content/uploads/2018/10/The-D-Zone_Main-Logo_google.png" alt="the-d-zone eBay Store" title="the-d-zone eBay Store" /></a></div> <div class="garanty"> id="social"></div> </div> <div class="product"> <div class="warraper"><input name="tabs" id="leftmenu" type="checkbox" /> <div id="CentralArea" class="zin-central"> <div class="top"> <h1 class="tittle">NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for CHRYSLER TOWN & COUNTRY EX 2001-2004 3.8L/230</h1> <div class="product-image-box"> <div id="content1" class="product-image-container"><img src="https://midnightautos.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/04/ngkp6c.png" alt="NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for CHRYSLER TOWN & COUNTRY EX 2001-2004 3.8L/230" /></div> </div> <div class="specifics"> <div class="titel">Product Description</div> <p>Description</p> <ul> <b> <p>These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One</p> </b> </ul> <p>FEATURES</p> <ul> <b> <li>Engine V6, Engine Size 3.8L/230</li><li>Engine Family Mopar V6</li><li>Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.</li><li>Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy</li><li>Sold In 6 Pack</li> </b> </ul> </div> <div class="fitments"> <p>FITMENT</p> <ul><b> CHRYSLER TOWN & COUNTRY EX 2001-2004 3.8L/230 </b></ul> </div> </div> <div class="discription"> <div class="tab"><input checked="" name="tabs" id="tab1" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab2" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab3" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab4" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab5" type="radio" /> <ul class="tab-titel"> <li><label for="tab1" id="lt1">Payment</label></li> <li><label for="tab2" id="lt2">Shipping </label></li> <li></li> </ul> <section id="content1"> <p>We accept the following:</p> <ul> <li><b>PayPal</b></li> <li><b>All Major Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express,Discover)</b></li> <li><b style="background-color: initial;"><br /></b></li> <li><b style="background-color: initial;"><img src="https://thed.zone/wp-content/uploads/2018/04/Diesel-Zone_Payments.png" alt="Payment Gateways" /></b></li> </ul> </section> <section id="content2"> <ul> <li><strong>Shipping and Handling Charges Are Free</strong> unless specified in the listing.</li> <li>Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.</li> <li><br /></li> <li> <font color="#CC0000">**We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.</font> </li> <li> <font color="#CC0000"><br /></font> </li> <li><strong>Shipment Carrier:</strong> Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.</li> <li>International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.</li> <li>If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.</li> <li><br /></li> <li> <font color="#CC0000">**We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**</font> </li> <li> <font color="#CC0000"><br /></font> </li> <li><strong>Delivery Time:</strong> Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.</li> </ul> </section><b></b> </div><b></b> </div><b></b> </div><b></b> </div> </div> </div> <img src="https://ebay-222319.appspot.com/UA-129119093-1/itm/323455192211?pixel"></div>

class="tittle">NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for CHRYSLER TOWN & COUNTRY EX 2003-2003 3.3L/201</h1> <div class="product-image-box"> <div id="content1" class="product-image-container"><img src="https://midnightautos.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/04/ngkp6c.png" alt="NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for CHRYSLER TOWN & COUNTRY EX 2003-2003 3.3L/201" /></div> </div> <div class="specifics"> <div class="titel">Product Description</div> <p>Description</p> <ul> <b> <p>These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One</p> </b> </ul> <p>FEATURES</p> <ul> <b> <li>Engine V6, Engine Size 3.3L/201</li><li>Engine Family Mopar V6</li><li>Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.</li><li>Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy</li><li>Sold In 6 Pack</li> </b> </ul> </div> <div class="fitments"> <p>FITMENT</p> <ul><b> CHRYSLER TOWN & COUNTRY EX 2003-2003 3.3L/201 </b></ul> </div> </div> <div class="discription"> <div class="tab"><input checked="" name="tabs" id="tab1" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab2" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab3" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab4" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab5" type="radio" /> <ul class="tab-titel"> <li><label for="tab1" id="lt1">Payment</label></li> <li><label for="tab2" id="lt2">Shipping </label></li> <li></li> </ul> <section id="content1"> <p>We accept the following:</p> <ul> <li><b>PayPal</b></li> <li><b>All Major Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express,Discover)</b></li> <li><b style="background-color: initial;"><br /></b></li> <li><b style="background-color: initial;"><img src="https://thed.zone/wp-content/uploads/2018/04/Diesel-Zone_Payments.png" alt="Payment Gateways" /></b></li> </ul> </section> <section id="content2"> <ul> <li><strong>Shipping and Handling Charges Are Free</strong> unless specified in the listing.</li> <li>Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.</li> <li><br /></li> <li> <font color="#CC0000">**We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.</font> </li> <li> <font color="#CC0000"><br /></font> </li> <li><strong>Shipment Carrier:</strong> Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.</li> <li>International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.</li> <li>If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.</li> <li><br /></li> <li> <font color="#CC0000">**We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**</font> </li> <li> <font color="#CC0000"><br /></font> </li> <li><strong>Delivery Time:</strong> Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.</li> </ul> </section><b></b> </div><b></b> </div><b></b> </div><b></b> </div> </div> </div> <img src="https://ebay-222319.appspot.com/UA-129119093-1/itm/323455192211?pixel"></div>

id="social"></div> </div> <div class="product"> <div class="warraper"><input name="tabs" id="leftmenu" type="checkbox" /> <div id="CentralArea" class="zin-central"> <div class="top"> <h1 class="tittle">NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for CHRYSLER TOWN & COUNTRY LIMITED 2001-2007 3.8L/230</h1> <div class="product-image-box"> <div id="content1" class="product-image-container"><img src="https://midnightautos.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/04/ngkp6c.png" alt="NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for CHRYSLER TOWN & COUNTRY LIMITED 2001-2007 3.8L/230" /></div> </div> <div class="specifics"> <div class="titel">Product Description</div> <p>Description</p> <ul> <b> <p>These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One</p> </b> </ul> <p>FEATURES</p> <ul> <b> <li>Engine V6, Engine Size 3.8L/230</li><li>Engine Family Mopar V6</li><li>Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.</li><li>Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy</li><li>Sold In 6 Pack</li> </b> </ul> </div> <div class="fitments"> <p>FITMENT</p> <ul><b> CHRYSLER TOWN & COUNTRY LIMITED 2001-2007 3.8L/230 </b></ul> </div> </div> <div class="discription"> <div class="tab"><input checked="" name="tabs" id="tab1" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab2" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab3" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab4" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab5" type="radio" /> <ul class="tab-titel"> <li><label for="tab1" id="lt1">Payment</label></li> <li><label for="tab2" id="lt2">Shipping </label></li> <li></li> </ul> <section id="content1"> <p>We accept the following:</p> <ul> <li><b>PayPal</b></li> <li><b>All Major Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express,Discover)</b></li> <li><b style="background-color: initial;"><br /></b></li> <li><b style="background-color: initial;"><img src="https://thed.zone/wp-content/uploads/2018/04/Diesel-Zone_Payments.png" alt="Payment Gateways" /></b></li> </ul> </section> <section id="content2"> <ul> <li><strong>Shipping and Handling Charges Are Free</strong> unless specified in the listing.</li> <li>Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.</li> <li><br /></li> <li> <font color="#CC0000">**We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.</font> </li> <li> <font color="#CC0000"><br /></font> </li> <li><strong>Shipment Carrier:</strong> Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.</li> <li>International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.</li> <li>If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.</li> <li><br /></li> <li> <font color="#CC0000">**We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**</font> </li> <li> <font color="#CC0000"><br /></font> </li> <li><strong>Delivery Time:</strong> Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.</li> </ul> </section><b></b> </div><b></b> </div><b></b> </div><b></b> </div> </div> </div> <img src="https://ebay-222319.appspot.com/UA-129119093-1/itm/323455192211?pixel"></div>

class="tittle">NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for CHRYSLER TOWN & COUNTRY LIMITED 2003-2003 3.3L/201</h1> <div class="product-image-box"> <div id="content1" class="product-image-container"><img src="https://midnightautos.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/04/ngkp6c.png" alt="NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for CHRYSLER TOWN & COUNTRY LIMITED 2003-2003 3.3L/201" /></div> </div> <div class="specifics"> <div class="titel">Product Description</div> <p>Description</p> <ul> <b> <p>These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One</p> </b> </ul> <p>FEATURES</p> <ul> <b> <li>Engine V6, Engine Size 3.3L/201</li><li>Engine Family Mopar V6</li><li>Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.</li><li>Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy</li><li>Sold In 6 Pack</li> </b> </ul> </div> <div class="fitments"> <p>FITMENT</p> <ul><b> CHRYSLER TOWN & COUNTRY LIMITED 2003-2003 3.3L/201 </b></ul> </div> </div> <div class="discription"> <div class="tab"><input checked="" name="tabs" id="tab1" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab2" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab3" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab4" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab5" type="radio" /> <ul class="tab-titel"> <li><label for="tab1" id="lt1">Payment</label></li> <li><label for="tab2" id="lt2">Shipping </label></li> <li></li> </ul> <section id="content1"> <p>We accept the following:</p> <ul> <li><b>PayPal</b></li> <li><b>All Major Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express,Discover)</b></li> <li><b style="background-color: initial;"><br /></b></li> <li><b style="background-color: initial;"><img src="https://thed.zone/wp-content/uploads/2018/04/Diesel-Zone_Payments.png" alt="Payment Gateways" /></b></li> </ul> </section> <section id="content2"> <ul> <li><strong>Shipping and Handling Charges Are Free</strong> unless specified in the listing.</li> <li>Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.</li> <li><br /></li> <li> <font color="#CC0000">**We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.</font> </li> <li> <font color="#CC0000"><br /></font> </li> <li><strong>Shipment Carrier:</strong> Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.</li> <li>International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.</li> <li>If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.</li> <li><br /></li> <li> <font color="#CC0000">**We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**</font> </li> <li> <font color="#CC0000"><br /></font> </li> <li><strong>Delivery Time:</strong> Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.</li> </ul> </section><b></b> </div><b></b> </div><b></b> </div><b></b> </div> </div> </div> <img src="https://ebay-222319.appspot.com/UA-129119093-1/itm/323455192211?pixel"></div>

id="social"></div> </div> <div class="product"> <div class="warraper"><input name="tabs" id="leftmenu" type="checkbox" /> <div id="CentralArea" class="zin-central"> <div class="top"> <h1 class="tittle">NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for CHRYSLER TOWN & COUNTRY LIMITED 2005-2005 3.3L/201</h1> <div class="product-image-box"> <div id="content1" class="product-image-container"><img src="https://midnightautos.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/04/ngkp6c.png" alt="NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for CHRYSLER TOWN & COUNTRY LIMITED 2005-2005 3.3L/201" /></div> </div> <div class="specifics"> <div class="titel">Product Description</div> <p>Description</p> <ul> <b> <p>These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One</p> </b> </ul> <p>FEATURES</p> <ul> <b> <li>Engine V6, Engine Size 3.3L/201</li><li>Engine Family Mopar V6</li><li>Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.</li><li>Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy</li><li>Sold In 6 Pack</li> </b> </ul> </div> <div class="fitments"> <p>FITMENT</p> <ul><b> CHRYSLER TOWN & COUNTRY LIMITED 2005-2005 3.3L/201 </b></ul> </div> </div> <div class="discription"> <div class="tab"><input checked="" name="tabs" id="tab1" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab2" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab3" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab4" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab5" type="radio" /> <ul class="tab-titel"> <li><label for="tab1" id="lt1">Payment</label></li> <li><label for="tab2" id="lt2">Shipping </label></li> <li></li> </ul> <section id="content1"> <p>We accept the following:</p> <ul> <li><b>PayPal</b></li> <li><b>All Major Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express,Discover)</b></li> <li><b style="background-color: initial;"><br /></b></li> <li><b style="background-color: initial;"><img src="https://thed.zone/wp-content/uploads/2018/04/Diesel-Zone_Payments.png" alt="Payment Gateways" /></b></li> </ul> </section> <section id="content2"> <ul> <li><strong>Shipping and Handling Charges Are Free</strong> unless specified in the listing.</li> <li>Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.</li> <li><br /></li> <li> <font color="#CC0000">**We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.</font> </li> <li> <font color="#CC0000"><br /></font> </li> <li><strong>Shipment Carrier:</strong> Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.</li> <li>International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.</li> <li>If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.</li> <li><br /></li> <li> <font color="#CC0000">**We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**</font> </li> <li> <font color="#CC0000"><br /></font> </li> <li><strong>Delivery Time:</strong> Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.</li> </ul> </section><b></b> </div><b></b> </div><b></b> </div><b></b> </div> </div> </div> <img src="https://ebay-222319.appspot.com/UA-129119093-1/itm/323455192211?pixel"></div>

Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.</li><li>Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy</li><li>Sold In 6 Pack</li> </b> </ul> </div> <div class="fitments"> <p>FITMENT</p> <ul><b> CHRYSLER TOWN & COUNTRY LX 2001-2001 3.3L/201 </b></ul> </div> </div> <div class="discription"> <div class="tab"><input checked="" name="tabs" id="tab1" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab2" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab3" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab4" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab5" type="radio" /> <ul class="tab-titel"> <li><label for="tab1" id="lt1">Payment</label></li> <li><label for="tab2" id="lt2">Shipping </label></li> <li></li> </ul> <section id="content1"> <p>We accept the following:</p> <ul> <li><b>PayPal</b></li> <li><b>All Major Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express,Discover)</b></li> <li><b style="background-color: initial;"><br /></b></li> <li><b style="background-color: initial;"><img src="https://thed.zone/wp-content/uploads/2018/04/Diesel-Zone_Payments.png" alt="Payment Gateways" /></b></li> </ul> </section> <section id="content2"> <ul> <li><strong>Shipping and Handling Charges Are Free</strong> unless specified in the listing.</li> <li>Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.</li> <li><br /></li> <li> <font color="#CC0000">**We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.</font> </li> <li> <font color="#CC0000"><br /></font> </li> <li><strong>Shipment Carrier:</strong> Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.</li> <li>International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. id="social"></div> </div> <div class="product"> <div class="warraper"><input name="tabs" id="leftmenu" type="checkbox" /> <div id="CentralArea" class="zin-central"> <div class="top"> <h1 class="tittle">NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for CHRYSLER TOWN & COUNTRY LX 2002-2003 3.8L/230</h1> <div class="product-image-box"> <div id="content1" class="product-image-container"><img src="https://midnightautos.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/04/ngkp6c.png" alt="NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for CHRYSLER TOWN & COUNTRY LX 2002-2003 3.8L/230" /></div> </div> <div class="specifics"> <div class="titel">Product Description</div> <p>Description</p> <ul> <b> <p>These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One</p> </b> </ul> <p>FEATURES</p> <ul> <b> <li>Engine V6, Engine Size 3.8L/230</li><li>Engine Family Mopar V6</li><li>Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.</li><li>Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy</li><li>Sold In 6 Pack</li> </b> </ul> </div> <div class="fitments"> <p>FITMENT</p> <ul><b> CHRYSLER TOWN & COUNTRY LX 2002-2003 3.8L/230 </b></ul> </div> </div> <div class="discription"> <div class="tab"><input checked="" name="tabs" id="tab1" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab2" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab3" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab4" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab5" type="radio" /> <ul class="tab-titel"> <li><label for="tab1" id="lt1">Payment</label></li> <li><label for="tab2" id="lt2">Shipping </label></li> <li></li> </ul> <section id="content1"> <p>We accept the following:</p> <ul> <li><b>PayPal</b></li> <li><b>All Major Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express,Discover)</b></li> <li><b style="background-color: initial;"><br /></b></li> <li><b style="background-color: initial;"><img src="https://thed.zone/wp-content/uploads/2018/04/Diesel-Zone_Payments.png" alt="Payment Gateways" /></b></li> </ul> </section> <section id="content2"> <ul> <li><strong>Shipping and Handling Charges Are Free</strong> unless specified in the listing.</li> <li>Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.</li> <li><br /></li> <li> <font color="#CC0000">**We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.</font> </li> <li> <font color="#CC0000"><br /></font> </li> <li><strong>Shipment Carrier:</strong> Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.</li> <li>International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.</li> <li>If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.</li> <li><br /></li> <li> <font color="#CC0000">**We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**</font> </li> <li> <font color="#CC0000"><br /></font> </li> <li><strong>Delivery Time:</strong> Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.</li> </ul> </section><b></b> </div><b></b> </div><b></b> </div><b></b> </div> </div> </div> <img src="https://ebay-222319.appspot.com/UA-129119093-1/itm/323455192211?pixel"></div>

<ul> <li class="shipping"><img src="https://thed.zone/wp-content/uploads/2018/10/The-D-Zone_Ebay-Shop-Free-USA-Shipping-Icon.png" alt="Fast and Free Shipping"/></li> </ul> </div> </div> </div> <div id="social"></div> </div> <div class="product"> <div class="warraper"><input name="tabs" id="leftmenu" type="checkbox" /> <div id="CentralArea" class="zin-central"> <div class="top"> <h1 class="tittle">NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for CHRYSLER TOWN & COUNTRY LX 2003-2010 3.3L/201</h1> <div class="product-image-box"> <div id="content1" class="product-image-container"><img src="https://midnightautos.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/04/ngkp6c.png" alt="NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for CHRYSLER TOWN & COUNTRY LX 2003-2010 3.3L/201" /></div> </div> <div class="specifics"> <div class="titel">Product Description</div> <p>Description</p> <ul> <b> <p>These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One</p> </b> </ul> <p>FEATURES</p> <ul> <b> <li>Engine V6, Engine Size 3.3L/201</li><li>Engine Family Mopar V6</li><li>Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.</li><li>Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy</li><li>Sold In 6 Pack</li> </b> </ul> </div> <div class="fitments"> <p>FITMENT</p> <ul><b> CHRYSLER TOWN & COUNTRY LX 2003-2010 3.3L/201 </b></ul> </div> </div> <div class="discription"> <div class="tab"><input checked="" name="tabs" id="tab1" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab2" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab3" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab4" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab5" type="radio" /> <ul class="tab-titel"> <li><label for="tab1" id="lt1">Payment</label></li> <li><label for="tab2" id="lt2">Shipping </label></li> <li></li> </ul> <section id="content1"> <p>We accept the following:</p> <ul> <li><b>PayPal</b></li> <li><b>All Major Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express,Discover)</b></li> <li><b style="background-color: initial;"><br /></b></li> <li><b style="background-color: initial;"><img src="https://thed.zone/wp-content/uploads/2018/04/Diesel-Zone_Payments.png" alt="Payment Gateways" /></b></li> </ul> </section> <section id="content2"> <ul> <li><strong>Shipping and Handling Charges Are Free</strong> unless specified in the listing.</li> <li>Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.</li> <li><br /></li> <li> <font color="#CC0000">**We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.</font> </li> <li> <font color="#CC0000"><br /></font> </li> <li><strong>Shipment Carrier:</strong> Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.</li> <li>International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.</li> <li>If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.</li> <li><br /></li> <li> <font color="#CC0000">**We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**</font> </li> <li> <font color="#CC0000"><br /></font> </li> <li><strong>Delivery Time:</strong> Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.</li> </ul> </section><b></b> </div><b></b> </div><b></b> </div><b></b> </div> </div> </div> <img src="https://ebay-222319.appspot.com/UA-129119093-1/itm/323455192211?pixel"></div>
