class="tittle">NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (10 Pack) for DODGE VIPER SRT-10 ACR 2008-2010 8.4L/515</h1> <div class="product-image-box"> <div id="content1" class="product-image-container"><img src="https://midnightautos.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/04/ngkp10c.png" alt="NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (10 Pack) for DODGE VIPER SRT-10 ACR 2008-2010 8.4L/515" /></div> </div> <div class="specifics"> <div class="titel">Product Description</div> <p>Description</p> <ul> <b> <p>These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One</p> </b> </ul> <p>FEATURES</p> <ul> <b> <li>Engine V10, Engine Size 8.4L/515</li><li>Engine Family Mopar V10</li><li>Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.</li><li>Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy</li><li>Sold In 10 Pack</li> </b> </ul> </div> <div class="fitments"> <p>FITMENT</p> <ul><b> DODGE VIPER SRT-10 ACR 2008-2010 8.4L/515 </b></ul> </div> </div> <div class="discription"> <div class="tab"><input checked="" name="tabs" id="tab1" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab2" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab3" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab4" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab5" type="radio" /> <ul class="tab-titel"> <li><label for="tab1" id="lt1">Payment</label></li> <li><label for="tab2" id="lt2">Shipping </label></li> <li></li> </ul> <section id="content1"> <p>We accept the following:</p> <ul> <li><b>PayPal</b></li> <li><b>All Major Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express,Discover)</b></li> <li><b style="background-color: initial;"><br /></b></li> <li><b style="background-color: initial;"><img src="https://thed.zone/wp-content/uploads/2018/04/Diesel-Zone_Payments.png" alt="Payment Gateways" /></b></li> </ul> </section> <section id="content2"> <ul> <li><strong>Shipping and Handling Charges Are Free</strong> unless specified in the listing.</li> <li>Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.</li> <li><br /></li> <li> <font color="#CC0000">**We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.</font> </li> <li> <font color="#CC0000"><br /></font> </li> <li><strong>Shipment Carrier:</strong> Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.</li> <li>International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.</li> <li>If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.</li> <li><br /></li> <li> <font color="#CC0000">**We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**</font> </li> <li> <font color="#CC0000"><br /></font> </li> <li><strong>Delivery Time:</strong> Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.</li> </ul> </section><b></b> </div><b></b> </div><b></b> </div><b></b> </div> </div> </div> <img src="https://ebay-222319.appspot.com/UA-129119093-1/itm/323455192211?pixel"></div>

class="tittle">NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (8 Pack) for JEEP GRAND CHEROKEE SRT8 2006-2010 6.1L/370</h1> <div class="product-image-box"> <div id="content1" class="product-image-container"><img src="https://midnightautos.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/04/ngkp8c.png" alt="NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (8 Pack) for JEEP GRAND CHEROKEE SRT8 2006-2010 6.1L/370" /></div> </div> <div class="specifics"> <div class="titel">Product Description</div> <p>Description</p> <ul> <b> <p>These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One</p> </b> </ul> <p>FEATURES</p> <ul> <b> <li>Engine V8, Engine Size 6.1L/370</li><li>Engine Family Mopar Hemi Gen III</li><li>Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.</li><li>Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy</li><li>Sold In 8 Pack</li> </b> </ul> </div> <div class="fitments"> <p>FITMENT</p> <ul><b> JEEP GRAND CHEROKEE SRT8 2006-2010 6.1L/370 </b></ul> </div> </div> <div class="discription"> <div class="tab"><input checked="" name="tabs" id="tab1" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab2" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab3" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab4" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab5" type="radio" /> <ul class="tab-titel"> <li><label for="tab1" id="lt1">Payment</label></li> <li><label for="tab2" id="lt2">Shipping </label></li> <li></li> </ul> <section id="content1"> <p>We accept the following:</p> <ul> <li><b>PayPal</b></li> <li><b>All Major Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express,Discover)</b></li> <li><b style="background-color: initial;"><br /></b></li> <li><b style="background-color: initial;"><img src="https://thed.zone/wp-content/uploads/2018/04/Diesel-Zone_Payments.png" alt="Payment Gateways" /></b></li> </ul> </section> <section id="content2"> <ul> <li><strong>Shipping and Handling Charges Are Free</strong> unless specified in the listing.</li> <li>Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.</li> <li><br /></li> <li> <font color="#CC0000">**We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.</font> </li> <li> <font color="#CC0000"><br /></font> </li> <li><strong>Shipment Carrier:</strong> Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.</li> <li>International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.</li> <li>If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.</li> <li><br /></li> <li> <font color="#CC0000">**We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**</font> </li> <li> <font color="#CC0000"><br /></font> </li> <li><strong>Delivery Time:</strong> Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.</li> </ul> </section><b></b> </div><b></b> </div><b></b> </div><b></b> </div> </div> </div> <img src="https://ebay-222319.appspot.com/UA-129119093-1/itm/323455192211?pixel"></div>

class="tittle">NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for JEEP WRANGLER 70TH ANNIVERSARY 2011-2011 3.8L/231</h1> <div class="product-image-box"> <div id="content1" class="product-image-container"><img src="https://midnightautos.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/04/ngkp6c.png" alt="NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for JEEP WRANGLER 70TH ANNIVERSARY 2011-2011 3.8L/231" /></div> </div> <div class="specifics"> <div class="titel">Product Description</div> <p>Description</p> <ul> <b> <p>These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One</p> </b> </ul> <p>FEATURES</p> <ul> <b> <li>Engine V6, Engine Size 3.8L/231</li><li>Engine Family Mopar V6</li><li>Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.</li><li>Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy</li><li>Sold In 6 Pack</li> </b> </ul> </div> <div class="fitments"> <p>FITMENT</p> <ul><b> JEEP WRANGLER 70TH ANNIVERSARY 2011-2011 3.8L/231 </b></ul> </div> </div> <div class="discription"> <div class="tab"><input checked="" name="tabs" id="tab1" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab2" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab3" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab4" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab5" type="radio" /> <ul class="tab-titel"> <li><label for="tab1" id="lt1">Payment</label></li> <li><label for="tab2" id="lt2">Shipping </label></li> <li></li> </ul> <section id="content1"> <p>We accept the following:</p> <ul> <li><b>PayPal</b></li> <li><b>All Major Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express,Discover)</b></li> <li><b style="background-color: initial;"><br /></b></li> <li><b style="background-color: initial;"><img src="https://thed.zone/wp-content/uploads/2018/04/Diesel-Zone_Payments.png" alt="Payment Gateways" /></b></li> </ul> </section> <section id="content2"> <ul> <li><strong>Shipping and Handling Charges Are Free</strong> unless specified in the listing.</li> <li>Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.</li> <li><br /></li> <li> <font color="#CC0000">**We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.</font> </li> <li> <font color="#CC0000"><br /></font> </li> <li><strong>Shipment Carrier:</strong> Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.</li> <li>International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.</li> <li>If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.</li> <li><br /></li> <li> <font color="#CC0000">**We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**</font> </li> <li> <font color="#CC0000"><br /></font> </li> <li><strong>Delivery Time:</strong> Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.</li> </ul> </section><b></b> </div><b></b> </div><b></b> </div><b></b> </div> </div> </div> <img src="https://ebay-222319.appspot.com/UA-129119093-1/itm/323455192211?pixel"></div>

id="social"></div> </div> <div class="product"> <div class="warraper"><input name="tabs" id="leftmenu" type="checkbox" /> <div id="CentralArea" class="zin-central"> <div class="top"> <h1 class="tittle">NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for JEEP WRANGLER ISLANDER 2010-2010 3.8L/231</h1> <div class="product-image-box"> <div id="content1" class="product-image-container"><img src="https://midnightautos.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/04/ngkp6c.png" alt="NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for JEEP WRANGLER ISLANDER 2010-2010 3.8L/231" /></div> </div> <div class="specifics"> <div class="titel">Product Description</div> <p>Description</p> <ul> <b> <p>These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One</p> </b> </ul> <p>FEATURES</p> <ul> <b> <li>Engine V6, Engine Size 3.8L/231</li><li>Engine Family Mopar V6</li><li>Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.</li><li>Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy</li><li>Sold In 6 Pack</li> </b> </ul> </div> <div class="fitments"> <p>FITMENT</p> <ul><b> JEEP WRANGLER ISLANDER 2010-2010 3.8L/231 </b></ul> </div> </div> <div class="discription"> <div class="tab"><input checked="" name="tabs" id="tab1" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab2" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab3" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab4" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab5" type="radio" /> <ul class="tab-titel"> <li><label for="tab1" id="lt1">Payment</label></li> <li><label for="tab2" id="lt2">Shipping </label></li> <li></li> </ul> <section id="content1"> <p>We accept the following:</p> <ul> <li><b>PayPal</b></li> <li><b>All Major Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express,Discover)</b></li> <li><b style="background-color: initial;"><br /></b></li> <li><b style="background-color: initial;"><img src="https://thed.zone/wp-content/uploads/2018/04/Diesel-Zone_Payments.png" alt="Payment Gateways" /></b></li> </ul> </section> <section id="content2"> <ul> <li><strong>Shipping and Handling Charges Are Free</strong> unless specified in the listing.</li> <li>Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.</li> <li><br /></li> <li> <font color="#CC0000">**We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.</font> </li> <li> <font color="#CC0000"><br /></font> </li> <li><strong>Shipment Carrier:</strong> Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.</li> <li>International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.</li> <li>If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.</li> <li><br /></li> <li> <font color="#CC0000">**We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**</font> </li> <li> <font color="#CC0000"><br /></font> </li> <li><strong>Delivery Time:</strong> Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.</li> </ul> </section><b></b> </div><b></b> </div><b></b> </div><b></b> </div> </div> </div> <img src="https://ebay-222319.appspot.com/UA-129119093-1/itm/323455192211?pixel"></div>

Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.</li><li>Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy</li><li>Sold In 6 Pack</li> </b> </ul> </div> <div class="fitments"> <p>FITMENT</p> <ul><b> JEEP WRANGLER MOUNTAIN 2010-2010 3.8L/231 </b></ul> </div> </div> <div class="discription"> <div class="tab"><input checked="" name="tabs" id="tab1" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab2" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab3" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab4" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab5" type="radio" /> <ul class="tab-titel"> <li><label for="tab1" id="lt1">Payment</label></li> <li><label for="tab2" id="lt2">Shipping </label></li> <li></li> </ul> <section id="content1"> <p>We accept the following:</p> <ul> <li><b>PayPal</b></li> <li><b>All Major Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express,Discover)</b></li> <li><b style="background-color: initial;"><br /></b></li> <li><b style="background-color: initial;"><img src="https://thed.zone/wp-content/uploads/2018/04/Diesel-Zone_Payments.png" alt="Payment Gateways" /></b></li> </ul> </section> <section id="content2"> <ul> <li><strong>Shipping and Handling Charges Are Free</strong> unless specified in the listing.</li> <li>Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.</li> <li><br /></li> <li> <font color="#CC0000">**We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.</font> </li> <li> <font color="#CC0000"><br /></font> </li> <li><strong>Shipment Carrier:</strong> Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.</li> <li>International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. class="tittle">NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for JEEP WRANGLER RUBICON 2007-2011 3.8L/231</h1> <div class="product-image-box"> <div id="content1" class="product-image-container"><img src="https://midnightautos.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/04/ngkp6c.png" alt="NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for JEEP WRANGLER RUBICON 2007-2011 3.8L/231" /></div> </div> <div class="specifics"> <div class="titel">Product Description</div> <p>Description</p> <ul> <b> <p>These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One</p> </b> </ul> <p>FEATURES</p> <ul> <b> <li>Engine V6, Engine Size 3.8L/231</li><li>Engine Family Mopar V6</li><li>Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.</li><li>Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy</li><li>Sold In 6 Pack</li> </b> </ul> </div> <div class="fitments"> <p>FITMENT</p> <ul><b> JEEP WRANGLER RUBICON 2007-2011 3.8L/231 </b></ul> </div> </div> <div class="discription"> <div class="tab"><input checked="" name="tabs" id="tab1" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab2" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab3" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab4" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab5" type="radio" /> <ul class="tab-titel"> <li><label for="tab1" id="lt1">Payment</label></li> <li><label for="tab2" id="lt2">Shipping </label></li> <li></li> </ul> <section id="content1"> <p>We accept the following:</p> <ul> <li><b>PayPal</b></li> <li><b>All Major Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express,Discover)</b></li> <li><b style="background-color: initial;"><br /></b></li> <li><b style="background-color: initial;"><img src="https://thed.zone/wp-content/uploads/2018/04/Diesel-Zone_Payments.png" alt="Payment Gateways" /></b></li> </ul> </section> <section id="content2"> <ul> <li><strong>Shipping and Handling Charges Are Free</strong> unless specified in the listing.</li> <li>Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.</li> <li><br /></li> <li> <font color="#CC0000">**We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.</font> </li> <li> <font color="#CC0000"><br /></font> </li> <li><strong>Shipment Carrier:</strong> Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.</li> <li>International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.</li> <li>If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.</li> <li><br /></li> <li> <font color="#CC0000">**We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**</font> </li> <li> <font color="#CC0000"><br /></font> </li> <li><strong>Delivery Time:</strong> Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.</li> </ul> </section><b></b> </div><b></b> </div><b></b> </div><b></b> </div> </div> </div> <img src="https://ebay-222319.appspot.com/UA-129119093-1/itm/323455192211?pixel"></div>

id="social"></div> </div> <div class="product"> <div class="warraper"><input name="tabs" id="leftmenu" type="checkbox" /> <div id="CentralArea" class="zin-central"> <div class="top"> <h1 class="tittle">NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for JEEP WRANGLER SAHARA 2007-2011 3.8L/231</h1> <div class="product-image-box"> <div id="content1" class="product-image-container"><img src="https://midnightautos.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/04/ngkp6c.png" alt="NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for JEEP WRANGLER SAHARA 2007-2011 3.8L/231" /></div> </div> <div class="specifics"> <div class="titel">Product Description</div> <p>Description</p> <ul> <b> <p>These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One</p> </b> </ul> <p>FEATURES</p> <ul> <b> <li>Engine V6, Engine Size 3.8L/231</li><li>Engine Family Mopar V6</li><li>Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.</li><li>Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy</li><li>Sold In 6 Pack</li> </b> </ul> </div> <div class="fitments"> <p>FITMENT</p> <ul><b> JEEP WRANGLER SAHARA 2007-2011 3.8L/231 </b></ul> </div> </div> <div class="discription"> <div class="tab"><input checked="" name="tabs" id="tab1" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab2" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab3" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab4" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab5" type="radio" /> <ul class="tab-titel"> <li><label for="tab1" id="lt1">Payment</label></li> <li><label for="tab2" id="lt2">Shipping </label></li> <li></li> </ul> <section id="content1"> <p>We accept the following:</p> <ul> <li><b>PayPal</b></li> <li><b>All Major Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express,Discover)</b></li> <li><b style="background-color: initial;"><br /></b></li> <li><b style="background-color: initial;"><img src="https://thed.zone/wp-content/uploads/2018/04/Diesel-Zone_Payments.png" alt="Payment Gateways" /></b></li> </ul> </section> <section id="content2"> <ul> <li><strong>Shipping and Handling Charges Are Free</strong> unless specified in the listing.</li> <li>Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.</li> <li><br /></li> <li> <font color="#CC0000">**We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.</font> </li> <li> <font color="#CC0000"><br /></font> </li> <li><strong>Shipment Carrier:</strong> Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.</li> <li>International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.</li> <li>If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.</li> <li><br /></li> <li> <font color="#CC0000">**We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**</font> </li> <li> <font color="#CC0000"><br /></font> </li> <li><strong>Delivery Time:</strong> Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.</li> </ul> </section><b></b> </div><b></b> </div><b></b> </div><b></b> </div> </div> </div> <img src="https://ebay-222319.appspot.com/UA-129119093-1/itm/323455192211?pixel"></div>

class="tittle">NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for JEEP WRANGLER SPORT 2010-2011 3.8L/231</h1> <div class="product-image-box"> <div id="content1" class="product-image-container"><img src="https://midnightautos.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/04/ngkp6c.png" alt="NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for JEEP WRANGLER SPORT 2010-2011 3.8L/231" /></div> </div> <div class="specifics"> <div class="titel">Product Description</div> <p>Description</p> <ul> <b> <p>These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One</p> </b> </ul> <p>FEATURES</p> <ul> <b> <li>Engine V6, Engine Size 3.8L/231</li><li>Engine Family Mopar V6</li><li>Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.</li><li>Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy</li><li>Sold In 6 Pack</li> </b> </ul> </div> <div class="fitments"> <p>FITMENT</p> <ul><b> JEEP WRANGLER SPORT 2010-2011 3.8L/231 </b></ul> </div> </div> <div class="discription"> <div class="tab"><input checked="" name="tabs" id="tab1" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab2" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab3" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab4" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab5" type="radio" /> <ul class="tab-titel"> <li><label for="tab1" id="lt1">Payment</label></li> <li><label for="tab2" id="lt2">Shipping </label></li> <li></li> </ul> <section id="content1"> <p>We accept the following:</p> <ul> <li><b>PayPal</b></li> <li><b>All Major Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express,Discover)</b></li> <li><b style="background-color: initial;"><br /></b></li> <li><b style="background-color: initial;"><img src="https://thed.zone/wp-content/uploads/2018/04/Diesel-Zone_Payments.png" alt="Payment Gateways" /></b></li> </ul> </section> <section id="content2"> <ul> <li><strong>Shipping and Handling Charges Are Free</strong> unless specified in the listing.</li> <li>Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.</li> <li><br /></li> <li> <font color="#CC0000">**We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.</font> </li> <li> <font color="#CC0000"><br /></font> </li> <li><strong>Shipment Carrier:</strong> Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.</li> <li>International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.</li> <li>If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.</li> <li><br /></li> <li> <font color="#CC0000">**We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**</font> </li> <li> <font color="#CC0000"><br /></font> </li> <li><strong>Delivery Time:</strong> Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.</li> </ul> </section><b></b> </div><b></b> </div><b></b> </div><b></b> </div> </div> </div> <img src="https://ebay-222319.appspot.com/UA-129119093-1/itm/323455192211?pixel"></div>

class="tittle">NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for JEEP WRANGLER UNLIMITED 70TH ANNIVERSARY 2011-2011 3.8L/231</h1> <div class="product-image-box"> <div id="content1" class="product-image-container"><img src="https://midnightautos.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/04/ngkp6c.png" alt="NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for JEEP WRANGLER UNLIMITED 70TH ANNIVERSARY 2011-2011 3.8L/231" /></div> </div> <div class="specifics"> <div class="titel">Product Description</div> <p>Description</p> <ul> <b> <p>These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One</p> </b> </ul> <p>FEATURES</p> <ul> <b> <li>Engine V6, Engine Size 3.8L/231</li><li>Engine Family Mopar V6</li><li>Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.</li><li>Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy</li><li>Sold In 6 Pack</li> </b> </ul> </div> <div class="fitments"> <p>FITMENT</p> <ul><b> JEEP WRANGLER UNLIMITED 70TH ANNIVERSARY 2011-2011 3.8L/231 </b></ul> </div> </div> <div class="discription"> <div class="tab"><input checked="" name="tabs" id="tab1" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab2" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab3" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab4" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab5" type="radio" /> <ul class="tab-titel"> <li><label for="tab1" id="lt1">Payment</label></li> <li><label for="tab2" id="lt2">Shipping </label></li> <li></li> </ul> <section id="content1"> <p>We accept the following:</p> <ul> <li><b>PayPal</b></li> <li><b>All Major Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express,Discover)</b></li> <li><b style="background-color: initial;"><br /></b></li> <li><b style="background-color: initial;"><img src="https://thed.zone/wp-content/uploads/2018/04/Diesel-Zone_Payments.png" alt="Payment Gateways" /></b></li> </ul> </section> <section id="content2"> <ul> <li><strong>Shipping and Handling Charges Are Free</strong> unless specified in the listing.</li> <li>Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.</li> <li><br /></li> <li> <font color="#CC0000">**We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.</font> </li> <li> <font color="#CC0000"><br /></font> </li> <li><strong>Shipment Carrier:</strong> Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.</li> <li>International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.</li> <li>If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.</li> <li><br /></li> <li> <font color="#CC0000">**We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**</font> </li> <li> <font color="#CC0000"><br /></font> </li> <li><strong>Delivery Time:</strong> Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.</li> </ul> </section><b></b> </div><b></b> </div><b></b> </div><b></b> </div> </div> </div> <img src="https://ebay-222319.appspot.com/UA-129119093-1/itm/323455192211?pixel"></div>

class="product-image-container"><img src="https://midnightautos.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/04/ngkp6c.png" alt="NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for JEEP WRANGLER UNLIMITED ISLANDER 2010-2010 3.8L/231" /></div> </div> <div class="specifics"> <div class="titel">Product Description</div> <p>Description</p> <ul> <b> <p>These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One</p> </b> </ul> <p>FEATURES</p> <ul> <b> <li>Engine V6, Engine Size 3.8L/231</li><li>Engine Family Mopar V6</li><li>Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.</li><li>Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy</li><li>Sold In 6 Pack</li> </b> </ul> </div> <div class="fitments"> <p>FITMENT</p> <ul><b> JEEP WRANGLER UNLIMITED ISLANDER 2010-2010 3.8L/231 </b></ul> </div> </div> <div class="discription"> <div class="tab"><input checked="" name="tabs" id="tab1" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab2" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab3" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab4" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab5" type="radio" /> <ul class="tab-titel"> <li><label for="tab1" id="lt1">Payment</label></li> <li><label for="tab2" id="lt2">Shipping </label></li> <li></li> </ul> <section id="content1"> <p>We accept the following:</p> <ul> <li><b>PayPal</b></li> <li><b>All Major Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express,Discover)</b></li> <li><b style="background-color: initial;"><br /></b></li> <li><b style="background-color: initial;"><img src="https://thed.zone/wp-content/uploads/2018/04/Diesel-Zone_Payments.png" alt="Payment Gateways" /></b></li> </ul> </section> <section id="content2"> <ul> <li><strong>Shipping and Handling Charges Are Free</strong> unless specified in the listing.</li> <li>Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.</li> <li><br /></li> <li> <font color="#CC0000">**We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.</font> </li> <li> <font color="#CC0000"><br /></font> </li> <li><strong>Shipment Carrier:</strong> Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.</li> <li>International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.</li> <li>If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.</li> <li><br /></li> <li> <font color="#CC0000">**We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**</font> </li> <li> <font color="#CC0000"><br /></font> </li> <li><strong>Delivery Time:</strong> Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. id="social"></div> </div> <div class="product"> <div class="warraper"><input name="tabs" id="leftmenu" type="checkbox" /> <div id="CentralArea" class="zin-central"> <div class="top"> <h1 class="tittle">NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for JEEP WRANGLER UNLIMITED MOUNTAIN 2010-2010 3.8L/231</h1> <div class="product-image-box"> <div id="content1" class="product-image-container"><img src="https://midnightautos.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/04/ngkp6c.png" alt="NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for JEEP WRANGLER UNLIMITED MOUNTAIN 2010-2010 3.8L/231" /></div> </div> <div class="specifics"> <div class="titel">Product Description</div> <p>Description</p> <ul> <b> <p>These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One</p> </b> </ul> <p>FEATURES</p> <ul> <b> <li>Engine V6, Engine Size 3.8L/231</li><li>Engine Family Mopar V6</li><li>Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.</li><li>Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy</li><li>Sold In 6 Pack</li> </b> </ul> </div> <div class="fitments"> <p>FITMENT</p> <ul><b> JEEP WRANGLER UNLIMITED MOUNTAIN 2010-2010 3.8L/231 </b></ul> </div> </div> <div class="discription"> <div class="tab"><input checked="" name="tabs" id="tab1" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab2" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab3" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab4" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab5" type="radio" /> <ul class="tab-titel"> <li><label for="tab1" id="lt1">Payment</label></li> <li><label for="tab2" id="lt2">Shipping </label></li> <li></li> </ul> <section id="content1"> <p>We accept the following:</p> <ul> <li><b>PayPal</b></li> <li><b>All Major Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express,Discover)</b></li> <li><b style="background-color: initial;"><br /></b></li> <li><b style="background-color: initial;"><img src="https://thed.zone/wp-content/uploads/2018/04/Diesel-Zone_Payments.png" alt="Payment Gateways" /></b></li> </ul> </section> <section id="content2"> <ul> <li><strong>Shipping and Handling Charges Are Free</strong> unless specified in the listing.</li> <li>Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.</li> <li><br /></li> <li> <font color="#CC0000">**We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.</font> </li> <li> <font color="#CC0000"><br /></font> </li> <li><strong>Shipment Carrier:</strong> Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.</li> <li>International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.</li> <li>If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.</li> <li><br /></li> <li> <font color="#CC0000">**We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**</font> </li> <li> <font color="#CC0000"><br /></font> </li> <li><strong>Delivery Time:</strong> Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.</li> </ul> </section><b></b> </div><b></b> </div><b></b> </div><b></b> </div> </div> </div> <img src="https://ebay-222319.appspot.com/UA-129119093-1/itm/323455192211?pixel"></div>

Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.</li><li>Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy</li><li>Sold In 6 Pack</li> </b> </ul> </div> <div class="fitments"> <p>FITMENT</p> <ul><b> JEEP WRANGLER UNLIMITED RUBICON 2007-2011 3.8L/231 </b></ul> </div> </div> <div class="discription"> <div class="tab"><input checked="" name="tabs" id="tab1" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab2" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab3" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab4" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab5" type="radio" /> <ul class="tab-titel"> <li><label for="tab1" id="lt1">Payment</label></li> <li><label for="tab2" id="lt2">Shipping </label></li> <li></li> </ul> <section id="content1"> <p>We accept the following:</p> <ul> <li><b>PayPal</b></li> <li><b>All Major Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express,Discover)</b></li> <li><b style="background-color: initial;"><br /></b></li> <li><b style="background-color: initial;"><img src="https://thed.zone/wp-content/uploads/2018/04/Diesel-Zone_Payments.png" alt="Payment Gateways" /></b></li> </ul> </section> <section id="content2"> <ul> <li><strong>Shipping and Handling Charges Are Free</strong> unless specified in the listing.</li> <li>Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.</li> <li><br /></li> <li> <font color="#CC0000">**We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.</font> </li> <li> <font color="#CC0000"><br /></font> </li> <li><strong>Shipment Carrier:</strong> Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.</li> <li>International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. class="tittle">NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for JEEP WRANGLER UNLIMITED SAHARA 2007-2011 3.8L/231</h1> <div class="product-image-box"> <div id="content1" class="product-image-container"><img src="https://midnightautos.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/04/ngkp6c.png" alt="NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for JEEP WRANGLER UNLIMITED SAHARA 2007-2011 3.8L/231" /></div> </div> <div class="specifics"> <div class="titel">Product Description</div> <p>Description</p> <ul> <b> <p>These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One</p> </b> </ul> <p>FEATURES</p> <ul> <b> <li>Engine V6, Engine Size 3.8L/231</li><li>Engine Family Mopar V6</li><li>Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.</li><li>Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy</li><li>Sold In 6 Pack</li> </b> </ul> </div> <div class="fitments"> <p>FITMENT</p> <ul><b> JEEP WRANGLER UNLIMITED SAHARA 2007-2011 3.8L/231 </b></ul> </div> </div> <div class="discription"> <div class="tab"><input checked="" name="tabs" id="tab1" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab2" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab3" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab4" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab5" type="radio" /> <ul class="tab-titel"> <li><label for="tab1" id="lt1">Payment</label></li> <li><label for="tab2" id="lt2">Shipping </label></li> <li></li> </ul> <section id="content1"> <p>We accept the following:</p> <ul> <li><b>PayPal</b></li> <li><b>All Major Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express,Discover)</b></li> <li><b style="background-color: initial;"><br /></b></li> <li><b style="background-color: initial;"><img src="https://thed.zone/wp-content/uploads/2018/04/Diesel-Zone_Payments.png" alt="Payment Gateways" /></b></li> </ul> </section> <section id="content2"> <ul> <li><strong>Shipping and Handling Charges Are Free</strong> unless specified in the listing.</li> <li>Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.</li> <li><br /></li> <li> <font color="#CC0000">**We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.</font> </li> <li> <font color="#CC0000"><br /></font> </li> <li><strong>Shipment Carrier:</strong> Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.</li> <li>International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.</li> <li>If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.</li> <li><br /></li> <li> <font color="#CC0000">**We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**</font> </li> <li> <font color="#CC0000"><br /></font> </li> <li><strong>Delivery Time:</strong> Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.</li> </ul> </section><b></b> </div><b></b> </div><b></b> </div><b></b> </div> </div> </div> <img src="https://ebay-222319.appspot.com/UA-129119093-1/itm/323455192211?pixel"></div>

id="social"></div> </div> <div class="product"> <div class="warraper"><input name="tabs" id="leftmenu" type="checkbox" /> <div id="CentralArea" class="zin-central"> <div class="top"> <h1 class="tittle">NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for JEEP WRANGLER UNLIMITED SPORT 2010-2011 3.8L/231</h1> <div class="product-image-box"> <div id="content1" class="product-image-container"><img src="https://midnightautos.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/04/ngkp6c.png" alt="NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for JEEP WRANGLER UNLIMITED SPORT 2010-2011 3.8L/231" /></div> </div> <div class="specifics"> <div class="titel">Product Description</div> <p>Description</p> <ul> <b> <p>These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One</p> </b> </ul> <p>FEATURES</p> <ul> <b> <li>Engine V6, Engine Size 3.8L/231</li><li>Engine Family Mopar V6</li><li>Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.</li><li>Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy</li><li>Sold In 6 Pack</li> </b> </ul> </div> <div class="fitments"> <p>FITMENT</p> <ul><b> JEEP WRANGLER UNLIMITED SPORT 2010-2011 3.8L/231 </b></ul> </div> </div> <div class="discription"> <div class="tab"><input checked="" name="tabs" id="tab1" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab2" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab3" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab4" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab5" type="radio" /> <ul class="tab-titel"> <li><label for="tab1" id="lt1">Payment</label></li> <li><label for="tab2" id="lt2">Shipping </label></li> <li></li> </ul> <section id="content1"> <p>We accept the following:</p> <ul> <li><b>PayPal</b></li> <li><b>All Major Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express,Discover)</b></li> <li><b style="background-color: initial;"><br /></b></li> <li><b style="background-color: initial;"><img src="https://thed.zone/wp-content/uploads/2018/04/Diesel-Zone_Payments.png" alt="Payment Gateways" /></b></li> </ul> </section> <section id="content2"> <ul> <li><strong>Shipping and Handling Charges Are Free</strong> unless specified in the listing.</li> <li>Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.</li> <li><br /></li> <li> <font color="#CC0000">**We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.</font> </li> <li> <font color="#CC0000"><br /></font> </li> <li><strong>Shipment Carrier:</strong> Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.</li> <li>International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.</li> <li>If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.</li> <li><br /></li> <li> <font color="#CC0000">**We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**</font> </li> <li> <font color="#CC0000"><br /></font> </li> <li><strong>Delivery Time:</strong> Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.</li> </ul> </section><b></b> </div><b></b> </div><b></b> </div><b></b> </div> </div> </div> <img src="https://ebay-222319.appspot.com/UA-129119093-1/itm/323455192211?pixel"></div>

class="tittle">NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for JEEP WRANGLER UNLIMITED X 2007-2010 3.8L/231</h1> <div class="product-image-box"> <div id="content1" class="product-image-container"><img src="https://midnightautos.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/04/ngkp6c.png" alt="NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for JEEP WRANGLER UNLIMITED X 2007-2010 3.8L/231" /></div> </div> <div class="specifics"> <div class="titel">Product Description</div> <p>Description</p> <ul> <b> <p>These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One</p> </b> </ul> <p>FEATURES</p> <ul> <b> <li>Engine V6, Engine Size 3.8L/231</li><li>Engine Family Mopar V6</li><li>Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.</li><li>Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy</li><li>Sold In 6 Pack</li> </b> </ul> </div> <div class="fitments"> <p>FITMENT</p> <ul><b> JEEP WRANGLER UNLIMITED X 2007-2010 3.8L/231 </b></ul> </div> </div> <div class="discription"> <div class="tab"><input checked="" name="tabs" id="tab1" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab2" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab3" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab4" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab5" type="radio" /> <ul class="tab-titel"> <li><label for="tab1" id="lt1">Payment</label></li> <li><label for="tab2" id="lt2">Shipping </label></li> <li></li> </ul> <section id="content1"> <p>We accept the following:</p> <ul> <li><b>PayPal</b></li> <li><b>All Major Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express,Discover)</b></li> <li><b style="background-color: initial;"><br /></b></li> <li><b style="background-color: initial;"><img src="https://thed.zone/wp-content/uploads/2018/04/Diesel-Zone_Payments.png" alt="Payment Gateways" /></b></li> </ul> </section> <section id="content2"> <ul> <li><strong>Shipping and Handling Charges Are Free</strong> unless specified in the listing.</li> <li>Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.</li> <li><br /></li> <li> <font color="#CC0000">**We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.</font> </li> <li> <font color="#CC0000"><br /></font> </li> <li><strong>Shipment Carrier:</strong> Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.</li> <li>International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.</li> <li>If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.</li> <li><br /></li> <li> <font color="#CC0000">**We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**</font> </li> <li> <font color="#CC0000"><br /></font> </li> <li><strong>Delivery Time:</strong> Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.</li> </ul> </section><b></b> </div><b></b> </div><b></b> </div><b></b> </div> </div> </div> <img src="https://ebay-222319.appspot.com/UA-129119093-1/itm/323455192211?pixel"></div>

class="tittle">NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for JEEP WRANGLER X 2007-2010 3.8L/231</h1> <div class="product-image-box"> <div id="content1" class="product-image-container"><img src="https://midnightautos.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/04/ngkp6c.png" alt="NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for JEEP WRANGLER X 2007-2010 3.8L/231" /></div> </div> <div class="specifics"> <div class="titel">Product Description</div> <p>Description</p> <ul> <b> <p>These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One</p> </b> </ul> <p>FEATURES</p> <ul> <b> <li>Engine V6, Engine Size 3.8L/231</li><li>Engine Family Mopar V6</li><li>Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.</li><li>Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy</li><li>Sold In 6 Pack</li> </b> </ul> </div> <div class="fitments"> <p>FITMENT</p> <ul><b> JEEP WRANGLER X 2007-2010 3.8L/231 </b></ul> </div> </div> <div class="discription"> <div class="tab"><input checked="" name="tabs" id="tab1" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab2" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab3" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab4" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab5" type="radio" /> <ul class="tab-titel"> <li><label for="tab1" id="lt1">Payment</label></li> <li><label for="tab2" id="lt2">Shipping </label></li> <li></li> </ul> <section id="content1"> <p>We accept the following:</p> <ul> <li><b>PayPal</b></li> <li><b>All Major Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express,Discover)</b></li> <li><b style="background-color: initial;"><br /></b></li> <li><b style="background-color: initial;"><img src="https://thed.zone/wp-content/uploads/2018/04/Diesel-Zone_Payments.png" alt="Payment Gateways" /></b></li> </ul> </section> <section id="content2"> <ul> <li><strong>Shipping and Handling Charges Are Free</strong> unless specified in the listing.</li> <li>Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.</li> <li><br /></li> <li> <font color="#CC0000">**We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.</font> </li> <li> <font color="#CC0000"><br /></font> </li> <li><strong>Shipment Carrier:</strong> Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.</li> <li>International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.</li> <li>If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.</li> <li><br /></li> <li> <font color="#CC0000">**We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**</font> </li> <li> <font color="#CC0000"><br /></font> </li> <li><strong>Delivery Time:</strong> Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.</li> </ul> </section><b></b> </div><b></b> </div><b></b> </div><b></b> </div> </div> </div> <img src="https://ebay-222319.appspot.com/UA-129119093-1/itm/323455192211?pixel"></div>

src="https://midnightautos.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/04/ngkp6c.png" alt="NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for VOLKSWAGEN ROUTAN S 2009-2010 3.8L/231" /></div> </div> <div class="specifics"> <div class="titel">Product Description</div> <p>Description</p> <ul> <b> <p>These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One</p> </b> </ul> <p>FEATURES</p> <ul> <b> <li>Engine V6, Engine Size 3.8L/231</li><li>Engine Family Mopar V6</li><li>Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.</li><li>Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy</li><li>Sold In 6 Pack</li> </b> </ul> </div> <div class="fitments"> <p>FITMENT</p> <ul><b> VOLKSWAGEN ROUTAN S 2009-2010 3.8L/231 </b></ul> </div> </div> <div class="discription"> <div class="tab"><input checked="" name="tabs" id="tab1" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab2" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab3" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab4" type="radio" /><input name="tabs" id="tab5" type="radio" /> <ul class="tab-titel"> <li><label for="tab1" id="lt1">Payment</label></li> <li><label for="tab2" id="lt2">Shipping </label></li> <li></li> </ul> <section id="content1"> <p>We accept the following:</p> <ul> <li><b>PayPal</b></li> <li><b>All Major Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express,Discover)</b></li> <li><b style="background-color: initial;"><br /></b></li> <li><b style="background-color: initial;"><img src="https://thed.zone/wp-content/uploads/2018/04/Diesel-Zone_Payments.png" alt="Payment Gateways" /></b></li> </ul> </section> <section id="content2"> <ul> <li><strong>Shipping and Handling Charges Are Free</strong> unless specified in the listing.</li> <li>Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.</li> <li><br /></li> <li> <font color="#CC0000">**We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.</font> </li> <li> <font color="#CC0000"><br /></font> </li> <li><strong>Shipment Carrier:</strong> Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.</li> <li>International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. 3.8L/231" /></div> </div> <div class="specifics"> <div class="titel">Product Description</div> <p>Description</p> <ul> <b> <p>These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One</p> </b> </ul> <p>FEATURES</p> <ul> <b> <li>Engine V6, Engine Size 3.8L/231</li><li>Engine Family Mopar V6</li><li>Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.</li><li>Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer.
